item.title: Resize Disk .img
item.description: Shrinking images on Linux Context of the problem: Having a myimage.img bigger then the hardware support (if it is smaller there should be no problem; however, using the same strategy, you can better fit the image in the hardware support).

item.title: test page
item.description: This is a test page to see why the link I made isn’t working. Resize_Disk_img index
